refsynopsisdiv.para: _updown is invoked by pluto when it has brought up a new connection. This script is used to insert the appropriate routing entries for IPsec operation. The BSD version of this script does very little at present, and does not support the sourceip= parameters.

refsect1.title: HISTORY
refsect1.para: Man page written for the Linux FreeS/WAN project <http://www.freeswan.org/> by Michael Richardson. Original program written by Henry Spencer.
